casebody.data:
Sheila LEWIS, Appellant, v. GRAPHIC PACKAGING INTERNATIONAL, INC., Appellee. No. 11-1518. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted: Oct. 12, 2011. Filed: Oct. 13, 2011. Robert Alston Newcomb, Little Rock, AR, for Appellant. *644Richard A. Roderick, Joseph “Jess” E. Sweere, Cross & Gunter, Little Rock, AR, for Appellee. Before MURPHY, ARNOLD, and BENTON, Circuit Judges.

[UNPUBLISHED]

PER CURIAM.

Sheila Lewis appeals the district court’s1 adverse grant of summary judgment in her employment discrimination action. We deny her motion to supplement the appendix with evidence that was never submitted to the district court. See Allen v. U.S. Air Force, 608 F.3d 423, 433-34 (8th Cir.), cert. denied, - U.S. -, 131 S.Ct. 830, 178 L.Ed.2d 565 (2010). After careful de novo review, see Johnson v. Blaukat, 453 F.3d 1108, 1112 (8th Cir.2006), we agree that summary judgment was proper for the reasons stated by the district court. Accordingly, we affirm the judgment. See 8th Cir. R. 47B.

. The Honorable Susan Webber Wright, United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Arkansas.
